Service Details: Provides opportunities for retired and semi-retired business and professional people for fellowship, to listen to guest speakers, participate in various activities as determined by the members such as Bridge, dining in, dining out, walking, digital camera, and just being friends
Eligibility: Retired/semi-retired men and women - business, professional or degree of responsibility
Meetings: Meets the 4th Wednesday of every month from 10:00am - 11:30am at Holiday Inn - West Kelowna
